gw.plugin.billinginstruction

Interface IBillingInstruction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IBillingInstruction
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    The IBillingInstruction plugin provides hooks to customer logic that are related to BillingInstructions.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAdditionalCharges(BillingInstruction billingInstruction)
      This method will be called during the BillingInstruction.execute() method, and gives customers the opportunity to create additional charges on the billing instruction.
      void onSpecialHandlingHoldAllUnbilledItemsForFinalAudit(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
      Called after execute() when the special handling for this BI is set to "Hold All Unbilled Items"
      void onSpecialHandlingHoldChargesForFinalAudit(Charge charge)
      Called after execute() when the special handling for this BI is set to "Hold For Final Audit"

    • Method Detail

      • addAdditionalCharges

        void addAdditionalCharges(BillingInstruction billingInstruction)
        This method will be called during the BillingInstruction.execute() method, and gives customers the opportunity to create additional charges on the billing instruction.

        NOTE: these charges will be treated identically to the charges that were originally on the billing instruction - the will have their effective date set to the effective date of the billing instruction, and will have charge transactions and invoice items added automatically.

        Parameters:
        billingInstruction - The billing instruction on which to add charges

      • onSpecialHandlingHoldChargesForFinalAudit

        void onSpecialHandlingHoldChargesForFinalAudit(Charge charge)
        Called after execute() when the special handling for this BI is set to "Hold For Final Audit"
        Parameters:
        charge - the charge to use

      • onSpecialHandlingHoldAllUnbilledItemsForFinalAudit

        void onSpecialHandlingHoldAllUnbilledItemsForFinalAudit(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod)
        Called after execute() when the special handling for this BI is set to "Hold All Unbilled Items"
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the policy period affected
